long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This calculator plugin is a simple, yet functional browser extension designed to provide users with an easy-to-access calculator. The plugin features a clean user interface with clearly visible buttons for numbers and basic arithmetic operators, such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, and also a function for square root. The display input field is read-only to ensure the user interacts with the calculator through the provided buttons.
